dot.description: Whether to display a red dot instead of count

offset.description: set offset of the badge dot, like [x, y]

showZero.description: Whether to show badge when count is zero

status.description: Set Badge as a status dot

text.description: If status is set, text sets the display text of the status dot

numberStyle.description: sets the display style of the status dot

title.description: Text to show when hovering over the badge
